summary: Makes uGridsToLoad much more stable and lets you load saves with higher uGridsToLoad settings.
descriptionHtml:
Use with Safety Load (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46465/) to prevent infinite loading screens

This allows you to use higher uGridsToLoad settings (13 is the maximum I tested, 15 didn't crash but load time grows exponentially) and allows you to turn your uGridsToLoad setting back down and keep your save games. You can also change the setting in-game via console (ex: setini "uGridsToLoad:General" 7). Currently you'll have to open & close the map screen to force the game to load the new cells when you change it in-game, I plan to fix this later.

Requires SKSE.
author: Altimor
